I know that is what Catholics believe and I have searched the bible and it is NOT IN THERE! The apostles creed says that Jesus descended into hell. That is not in the bible. I know that paul said that Jesus descended into the lower parts of the earth which I interpret as descending to the grave and then he rose after 3 days.

I think it refers to hell in the classical sense of Hades, the underworld. By returning from there, Christ conquers death. If you equate hades with hell, as in revelation "and the name of him who sat upon the horse was death, and all hades/hell rode with him" (from memory, don't ask me for the version), then it makes some sort of sense.

 I beleive the term used is one that is used for 'the grave'.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Jesus descended into hell?
